Presidio Municipal Development District
=======================================



**Presidio Municipal Development District**
===========================================

![](https://presidiotx.us/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/tempFileForShare_20230922-151608.jpg)

To accomplish and preserve the most practical, vibrant, and healthy business climate in the City of Presidio and South Presidio County Region, by continuous pursuit of all available avenues of development for new or existing business opportunities to enhance employment while nurturing the expansion of our tax base and quality of life.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

![Solar And Art Fest 019](https://presidiotx.us/wp-content/uploads/2013/05/Solar-And-Art-Fest-019-1024x818.jpg)

Regular PMDD (Economic Development) Meeting date is the 1st Wednesday of every month at the PMDD Office 608 W O’Reilly Street, STE D., Presidio, Texas 79845 at 5:00 p.m.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The City of Presidio, Texas welcomes new business on the International Border of Texas and Mexico. The Presidio – Ojinaga Port is open 24/7. It is the only international crossing between El Paso and Del Rio. Travel into Mexico is easy with short crossing times for tourist and commercial traffic.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

For more information contact the PMDD, P.O. Box 3329, Presidio, Texas 79845, phone 432 229 3199

Brad Newton, Executive Director

Email
[bnewton@presidiotx.us](mailto:bnewton@presidiotx.us)
